price: Indeed, you and all that you worship besides Allah will be the fuel for Hell; you will surely enter it.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
